backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a contact form submission system and user profile management with role-based access control (admin/user permissions) using a mixin authorization pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a Customer Details checkout form in the cart drawer, and a Government Schemes page listing 6 Indian agricultural schemes with navigation link.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's purpose and key contents, used as a build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and semantic UI color variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Agro Crops React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with auth-guarded main routes and public auth routes, wrapping everything in a CartProvider and including all page routes including /schemes.
Reusable wrapper component that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger CSS animations (fadeIn, slideUp, zoomIn, etc.) on child content when it scrolls into view.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, and a contact section showing real email and phone as clickable mailto/tel links, plus a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile nav links, and a cart sheet that supports item management, customer detail form validation, and order checkout with success state.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart and wishlist state management, including add, remove, update quantity, clear, and toggle wishlist operations with derived cartCount and cartTotal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a useSubmitContact mutation hook that calls the backend actor's submitContact method and invalidates the contacts query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Poppins and Merriweather fonts, defining Tailwind layers with a green eco-friendly CSS custom property palette (light/dark), and utility animation classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying a gradient hero header, stats grid, and mission/vision section with animated sections, team members, and contact info for the Agro Crops platform.
frontend/src/pages/Cattle.tsx: Displays an interactive guide to organic livestock farming (cow, buffalo, goat, sheep, poultry) with searchable animal cards showing breed, food, care, and detailed information, plus a benefits section.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact page with a validated form (name, email, message) that submits via a React Query mutation, alongside static contact info (email, phone, address).
frontend/src/pages/Equipment.tsx: Shows a searchable catalog of farm equipment (tractor, plough, thresher, etc.) with category, description, uses, and power details, plus a maintenance tips section.
frontend/src/pages/Farm.tsx: Provides a searchable organic crop guide covering seven crops (wheat, rice, maize, etc.) with season, soil type, cultivation guidance, and tips, along with a benefits section.
frontend/src/pages/GovernmentSchemes.tsx: Lists major Indian government agricultural schemes (PM-KISAN, PMFBY, KCC, NMSA, Soil Health Card, etc.) with descriptions, benefits, and eligibility details in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page for the Agro Crops app featuring a hero section, organic farming benefits, region-based crop info, government schemes, and future feature roadmap. Uses animated sections and interactive region selector.
frontend/src/pages/OtpVerification.tsx: OTP verification page with a 4-digit input flow using sessionStorage for demo auth (hardcoded OTP '1234'). Redirects authenticated users away and navigates to home on success.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Organic product shop page displaying seeds, vegetables, and fertilizers with category filtering, search, wishlist, and add-to-cart functionality via CartContext.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Signup page that collects a 10-digit mobile number, validates it, stores it in sessionStorage, and navigates to the OTP verification page. Redirects already-authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Techniques.tsx: Informational page detailing organic farming techniques including composting, pest control, crop rotation, and additional methods like mulching and drip irrigation with step-by-step breakdowns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom green/brown color palette using OKLCH variables, extended typography, border radius, box shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot for an organic farming management system, documenting version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues such as broken cart functionality and signup routing problems.
